name: Singleplayer Maze
description:
This game created in scratch,sorry,for my next projects i will learn C++ as soon as possible.Go here to play:https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/723600453/fullscreen/

Welcom to your childhood!

"Singleplayer Maze" is world famous,revolution created by Jupiter Games in 1987.Maybe the basic gameplay can be stupid for you,this game have left a big step in video game industry that makes everyone who played it once return to this game even today!

You may not remeber this game(or even say it's not exist).Well,not everyone was born in 1980's.But if you was born in 1980's and still says this game is not exist,then seems you're not a human. Anyways,let's nostalgic and remember the big history of the Jupiter Games and their arts.

  1. Begining.

The official company called "Jupiter Games" was originally organised by [[DELETED]] Ejerson.He was traumatized a lot by losig his Wife,but his veins he filled with a videogame indusrty.Original Office of company was built in San-Francisco(in the photo).

2.The big start.

Loose about 2 years to find artists,coders,and people who will agree to do this game was realised in 1987.It was an explosion.From sales company got more than a million dolars.It was an WIN.

Unfortunately,after such a good time,the Director of the company,"Ejerson",have died.The body was only found in [[DATA MISSING]].Company have migrated in USSR then,and have been closed,after creating around 38 games,without any money.The office in San-Francisco now burned.

From the code and numbers,me.have recreated the famous game your parents played.Using the Original Code from my cartrige,i make you enjoy your favorite game of childhood.Let's play!

P.S.I will leafe this message here.I lost  the code with cartrige before find out that this game... little bigger in history.Around 10 years there were mysterious dissapearing of kids played this game.Everyone who played....now missing.

Searching information about it,i found a VHS tape of Ludvig Ejerson,son of Jupiter Games Director.I found in his journal that he wanted to find out what's going on.Police was destroying every Game Cartrige was found,so there was'n t much of them.Ludvig got one.Ok- ok,let's watch the tape....
